## Week 2 Assignment



```{r}

#Utilize the RMySQL package to handle DB Connecions and Queries.

library(RMySQL)

#Establish a dbConnect database connection (fill in user/password for your particular user.)

mydb = dbConnect(MySQL(), user='root', password='*******', dbname='movies', host='localhost')

#Query the DB for the data and drop it into a dataframe variable.
#This particular query is joining two tables into one query result.

movie_ratings <- dbGetQuery(mydb,"SELECT movies.movie_id, movie_title, reviews.review_id, reviews.reviewer_name, reviews.rating, reviews.review_text FROM movies LEFT JOIN reviews ON movies.movie_id = reviews.movie_id;")

movie_ratings
```
